1. Supervisors should be trained periodically. 
2. Institution may encourage knowledge-sharing among the scholars and guides. 
3. One-man supervisorship should be replaced with the panel of supervisors.
4. The panel of supervisors or Doctoral Committee should be the competent body to Qualify the thesis. Mere publication may not be the suitable indicator of quality of thesis.
5. Above all, the research philosophy should be taught as a separate course irrespective of the domain.
